ru.myx.ae3.binary

Interface TransferSocket

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Abortable, AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable

    public interface TransferSocket
extends java.io.Closeable, Abortable
    Socket is a pair of source and target which both make you able to read and write data from/to a channel.

      String getIdentity()
      Returns a string representation of a peer's address identifying a peer within a whole lots of different sources by mixing transport-type-name and transport-local-identity .

      Returns a string representation of local address.
      String getRemoteAddress()

      Returns a source instance to read data from this socket.

      Returns a target instance to write data to this socket.
